name: Pin-point Focus
effects: Increase ATK by 50% for 5 turns to caster
Add Wind element to physical attacks for 5 turn(s) to caster

desc_short: Boost own ATK and add wind element to physical attack
提高自身攻擊的數值+將自身的物理攻擊賦予風屬性

desc_long: Boosts own ATK and adds wind element to physical attack.
提高自身攻擊的數值，並將自身的物理攻擊賦予風屬性。
사용자의 공격력이 상승하고, 물리공격에 바람속성을 부여합니다.
